title: The Great Replacement: What AI's Sales Team Takeover Means for Brand Partnerships
author: Hass Dhia
excerpt: When SaaStr replaced 10 salespeople with 20 AI agents managed by 1.2 humans, it wasn't just a tech story - it was a preview of how every brand relationship will be evaluated, initiated, and maintained.

linkedinOrgTeaser:
NEW ON THE BLOG: When SaaStr replaced 10 salespeople with 20 AI agents, it wasn't just a tech story - it's a preview of how every brand partnership will be discovered and evaluated.

The same AI that's reshaping sales is coming for partnership decisions. The question isn't whether - it's who builds it first.

#BrandPartnerships #AI #LocalActivation #MarketingStrategy
linkedinPersonalTeaser:
Jason Lemkin replaced his entire sales team with AI agents. 10 people became 1.2 humans managing 20 bots.

Most people see this as a sales story. I think it's a preview of something bigger.

The same economics that make AI-powered prospecting viable for SaaS apply to brand partnerships. Finding the right local partners - coffee shops, gyms, retailers - requires the same grinding research work.

What if brands could evaluate 500 potential partners per quarter instead of 50? With the same team?

Wrote about what this means for local activation.
